prompts: Create a bipedal electric-type Pokemon with vibrant yellow skin and a sleek black hood.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a lizard and features bright colors and a playful personality.
Generate an electric Pokemon with a long tail and distinctive markings on its body.
Make a character inspired by Heliolisk, focusing on its unique features and habitat preferences.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban settings, showcasing a blend of agility and electric power.
Design a Pokemon with a striking color palette of yellow and black, known for its speed.
Give me a creature that embodies the essence of light and electricity, with playful traits.

distinctive_features: Long tail with an orange tip
